review: I come here alot. So its pretty disappointing to receive sub par service time and time again. This is probably the 5th time I have had less than satisfactory service at this location but I have no choice because the only other location in my area is just as terrible. So I deal with it because overall I like the food. Today was like no other the staff seemed overwhelmed and my server seemed frantic. Because of this I asked to be moved out of the bar area (epitome of poor service dont sit at the bar!). Once in a regular seating area our waitress brought us someone else's food whoops. We let her know and after a short time our food arrives. Food mediocre at best this time which is unfortunate because even though they have poor service the food is usually good. I have a mountain of mayo on my burger (see pics) and my gf food is luke warm and the avocado still had seeds in it. Because it will take an eternity to get our food fixed and lets face it I always worry about getting my food spit in when I send it back, I decide to modify my food and press on. She does the same. Im going to avoid this location for awhile. Its always poor but today was exceptionally poor.

The host showed me a table immediately after I walked in and handed me a very descriptive menu that was full of pictures. She sat me near two large TVs broadcasting live sports. It was a great start, before the rest of the experience went downhill. I ordered the bleu ribbon burger and a chicken tortilla soup. The server hand-wrote my order on a partitioned section of her booklet, which felt very old fashion. This restaurant does not have a modern tablet ordering system that I noticed from another Red Robin location. The interactive tablet allows customers to place orders, request refills, and pay without the presence of wait-staff. Chicken tortilla soup arrived first, and it was the worst I've ever had of this type. Watery, filled with frozen corn but lacking main ingredients such as chicken and avocado, the cheese was not grated thin enough for me, overloaded with sour cream, and the fried tortilla strips were completely flat at arrival without any crunch. Not to mention the price, $3.29 for about 6oz of soup, is even higher than what Whole Food charges. The bleu ribbon burger was decently executed although the combination of ingredients was not very imaginative. This burger is supposed to be unique from other Red Robin burgers by including a beef patty that is rubbed in steak sauce, and then topped with crumbled bleu cheese and crispy fried onion shreds. Meh. I thought that the sweetness of the chipotle aioli overpowered the taste of the patty. Also for some reason, I just couldn't really taste the distinct bitterness of bleu cheese. Furthermore, My burger must be covered with butter because I had a heavy feeling in my stomach after consumption. Sweet potato fries, included with the burger, are refillable and this is supposed to be the signature point at Red Robin. However, it meant nothing since service was nearly non-existent. Like many All-American chain restaurants, one server was responsible for an area of the restaurant. My server was either inefficient or assigned to way too many tables, because every time I wanted to make a request, she was either scrambling around the kitchen, loading up trays, or busy taking orders. I finished my burger and then waited 15 to 20 more minutes just for my first refill of fries. In my opinion, Slater's 50/50 outperforms this chain with perfunctory service, use of innovative seasonal ingredients, and high level of customization.
We ate our dinner in the bar. The waitress was great, she was very attentive and polite. Our burgers were cooked perfectly and the french fries too. I will visit here again.
All their burgers are good however my favorite is a Red Robin gourmet burger. The french fries are always fresh and crisp especially like the sweet potato fries

I don't know about coming to Red Robin again after this night out with the family.  Hospitality is a gift some have, some can learn and others don't care to use.  Our hostess was great and assured us we would be cared for.  Miranda did not introduce herself or take any interest in our reason for being at Red Robin. From that moment I knew it might be a great night or a whatever experience.  I ordered the wedgie burger and it was great! I was a little thrown to see it didn't have a bun ,but it was delicious. All the other meals ordered were very good as well.  Usually when food is brought out you would like silverware and a few napkins to get down to business . We had to ask for that from another waitress who was helping out. The garlic "herb" fries were not anything to scream about I would just stick to the regular fries if you do go here .  I can't say I would recommend this place unless you're hungry and the other restaurants around have hour long waits or you enjoy friendly host's! :)

Today was the second time we came to this Red Robin when the service and food were great. Our server David made our visit very enjoyable. He has a great personality. When we needed refills he brought them right away. He brought us more fries without us even asking for them. He is a great example of exceptional service. Our food was delicious. Everything came out fresh and hot. Way to go Red Robin!
Sheryl made our visit wonderful. This is our second time coming in and she always takes care of us !! She's a sweet heart!!! Thanks Sheryl we'll be coming back to see you !!

Great burger and beer bar - if you stick to the burgers and beer, or any other drinks. My wife decided to have a soup as well, and chose the French Onion. It came with a huge glob of cheese melting thru the soup, and sticking to the spoon when she tried to remove it. Disgusting! I know Americans like cheese on almost anything, but really..... in the soup? I bet the French would not want to be associated with this item. This cost you some stars, the burgers were fine, the beer was good too. I recommend anyone to avoid the soup, and go with the burgers.

I love this location! I've never had a bad experience here. Service is always amazing. Every time I come I see the manager walking around talking to everyone, asking how everything taste. One time me and my family came we waited a little longer than normal for a table and they brought us fries while we waited. It's awesome!
Service very friendly, Leila was awesome!  Disappointed that they took clamstrips off the menu (again).  Salmon was really good and black and blue burger was good as well.
went here last week with my husband for dinner. Our food was ok. I neveer like to send back food or complain, my chicken burger was a little cold but it was good.
Ended up getting food poisoning. Never got a call back after letting staff know. Never returning here.

I Love this place!! The service is great here...even on a busy night we have good service. The food is good. It's a fun atmosphere for a family night out. Most meals come with bottomless fries and if you order a kids meal with pasta you get bottomless pasta and sides too. Definitely a place I recommend to have a nice meal with friends or family that's not too expensive.

I go here often with my family,  it's usually our meeting spot after a day of shopping. I am giving 3 stars as the last time we went in our server was not on top of things. We waited a long time to order and to refill our drinks. Other than that,  we love red robin and continue to return as the burgers are to die for, and of course the bottomless steak fries!
I've never been "super impressed" by the food, service, or anything else at Red Robin.  Everything is just "okay".  Don't get me wrong, it isn't horrible, just meh.
Awesome service, great food, good drinks. I come here about once a week if not more with my fiancé and the service is always awesome.

First time ordering online through my Smartphone. It was super easy! I was able to edit each item i ordered and choose time for pick up. Staff was very friendly. Food was on time as promised online. Food was perfect temperature and made exactly as requested. Will definitely use online ordering and go back again.
This place was great, our server Darla was wonderful.. She was very kind and on point with what's in the menu.

I enjoy going here i have the rewards card just cause how often i go, and service is good but it depends on who you get as a waitress yesterday i ordered and ended up getting my food and finally had to ask about the appetizer cause i hadnt gotten it yet so that ended up being a to go item when i should have received it first. But all in all i enjoy the burgers and drinks the atmosphere is great i enjoy the renovations they did. And managers are always super nice and friendly they always come to tables and ask how things are going love their customer service.

We decided to stop at Red Robin for lunch. My mom and I had salads and my daughter and youngest son had the mac and chesse and my other son had the kids pizza. The servers brought out our salads and the mac and cheese.  The server stated that the pizza would be right out. Needless to say everyone had finished their food and my soon still was without his pizza 20 min later. Finally our server came back to our table and I let him know my son  had not received his pizza.  He goes to the kitchen and comes back with my son's pizza. By the time my son received his food, it was cold. Instead of my son eating his pizza there he decided to box it up and take it with him. As he's  eating his pizza in the car he screams out saying he just bit into something hard. He pits it out and it looks like bone.  I will not be eating here again.

The service is very good and always friendly and attentive to customers needs. Food is always hot and delicious. Burgers are juicey  and sometimes messy but oh so good. Was celebrating my birthday and Had a hot fudge sundae. it was yummy. fries were hot and my whiskey river bar b que chicken sandwhich was delicious.

Red Robin has always been one of my favorite restaurants. That being said, lately I feel as if the food is a hit and miss. There have been times where my burger is delicious, and others to where I wonder what happened.  The service at this particular location has always been excellent. We've never had an issue with being seated at a decent time, even if it's busy. The table service has also always been great. It just comes down to the food. On this past visit, my California chicken burger was a little dry and the bread was hard, almost as if it was old. My kids and wife's food looked great. No one else had any issues.  The bottomless fries kept coming and like I've mentioned, our waitress was very attentive and would fill up our drinks and fries, lol. Though this last experience wasn't a desirable one, I will be back.

Came to red robin had a great meal great service food was awesome atmosphere was great til we were leaving in the entry way was a lady blowing up balloons (red Robbin balloons) our 3 year old grandson saw them and pointed at one and asked can I have one the employee gave him a dirty look until he looked away and she went back to blowing balloons again.  one stinkin balloon was not gonna break the restaurant nor was it gonna be taken out of her check.  Rudest meanest thing we've ever experienced. Its all about that one gesture that you will forever remember. Sad so sad.  I would of been glad to of paid for the ballon.  If those balloons were not meant for the kids then don't blow them up where everyone can see them.  Do it out back I need to say that there must of been over 20 balloons and still blowing up more..Hope she sleeps well tonight after seeing our grandsons little sad face.  He is not that kid that throws fits he just sensed her meanness and walked away.

Came here on a Saturday afternoon and had a wonderful meal thanks to our waitress - McKenzie! She was extremely friendly, upbeat, and personable. She made sure that our drinks were always full and our bottomless fries continued to come! She also brought us a nice variety of dipping sauces for us to try with the fries.  We got a couple different burgers, sweet potato fries, and a milkshake which all came out pretty fast and everything tased great. We stayed and hung out for a while and felt welcome to do so. The restaurant was very clean and comfy. The menu also has a good variety of options to chose from depending on what you're in the mood for.

I have been to this Red Robin location few times and I have always had good experience. I usually do my orders to go and I have been satisfied with the food and service they provide. Last time I ordered the bruschetta chicken with extra avocado and it was great!!! I will definitely be coming back soon and dining in. Thank you for the great service.

Incredibly Bad Service Not only did it take the restaurant 55 minutes to seat a party of 6, I was given 30 - 40 minutes, and it took almost 15 minutes for 5 of our party to get their drinks, two people in the party received an appetizer and ate it before the rest of us got our drinks.  The icing on the cake was when people seated after us, got their drinks and their food before we did.  When I spoke to the manager upon leaving, he made jokes, like he really didn't care about us.  There was also bits of bone or something white and hard in my burger.  I won't ever return to this or any other Red Robin since it is obvious that this chain really doesn't care about their patrons.  Next time I crave a burger I'll go to Five Guys. At least it won't take me 2 hours to get in, eat and leave.

Amy waited on us tonight and she is a amazing server . She had two big parties that were not the nicest to her . She kept her cool gave great service . We will be back just because of her . She is GREAT

Our server Amy was the best! She gave us nothing but the best service tonight even though she had to deal with some customers that weren't the nicest. I just can't stress enough how great her service was. I will be back at this establishment just for her!

Terrific Cobb Salad and Nice Service! Not sure why I don't visit Red Robin more often. My husband and I were in Menifee last Sunday, 113 degrees and wanted a quick lunch. SO thankful to be seated in the adults ONLY section of their lounge. Nothing against kids - but - there is nothing worse than screaming children- kids do NOT belong in a bar! So it is SO nice for a restaurant to allow adults their own space - THANK YOU!   My salad was a complete bargain at $10.99 and I loved that I could see the calorie count (yes I am a little weird) My husband enjoyed his Chicken breast, said it was juicy.  We will return - if only for the peace and relaxation!

Red Robin has always been tradition for my younger brothers birthday - it's his favorite. My family and I joined him in celebration while Katie, our server, took care of us. We were a party of eleven, with 3 of them being young children. Our server was always quick to refill our drinks and make sure we were taken care of so kudos to her for keeping up with my family! The one thing I did notice though, is that we had ordered different meat temps for our burgers but all of them came out medium well. It happens, but maybe something to let the chefs know. Thanks again Red Robin! Always a good time.

Ok, yesterday Jan 3, I was there in the afternoon was looking to order something from the menu, when I looked up at two waitress where standing at the end of bar both had a plate of fries. They were talking then the one waitress stuck her hands in the fries she had and put some in the plate of the next waitress they finish there conversation and off the one went. And the scary part is the one digging in was looking over to where the fries where going. Then she finished making a drink with toppings then off she went to table to Serve those fries. Just yuck!! I walked out and didn't order!!!!

Red Robin for the loss for the final time. I ordered the salad that is specifically Gluten free on their allergy guide as long as I don't get the jalapeño coins.... so I order just like that letting the waitress know why.... she brings me the salad with the coins... I hand it back stating please remake as I stated I cannot eat it do to allergies. She comes back with a "new" salad... I start going to town only to find the coins tucked under the chicken and lettuce I consumed... thanks for the extreme pain Red Robin... used to love you guys but this was the last straw
I had the fish and chips and they were really good. Miguel the waiter provided excellent service  good food & service , I will be back

I almost never write a review about a chain restaurant, but I am going to make an exception here. I had been craving a good burger. Not one hidden by bread and fixings, but a burger good enough to stand alone with a bun, so you could taste the meat, pink inside and tender, grill marks from open flame grilling. The whole bit. Red Robin hit a home run with their very simple burger, a tavern bun, decorated only by a few sesame seeds, pink inside and tasty as well as juicy. The chef didn't smash down this burger onto the grill. The server was prompt and efficient and knew her menu, which was extensive. My burger came with fries and all the usual decorations on the side, perfect! That allows me to add pickles if I choose or simply eat them solo. Unlimited steak fries of course. I still wish they would opt for the shoe string variety, but then again I would eat too many of them. Nicely done red robin. You are my burger spot.
Not a fan of this place. The food is mediocre and the drinks are overpriced for what they are.

The best waitress, food and price! Sabrina, thank you for addressing our needs before we had to ask!  Thank you for being so accommodating and bringing us a bendie straw for our senior!   This was the best customer service we have encountered anywhere from Palm Springs to Temecula, actually the best in California!  And the food was awesome!

It takes a year or so to forget why I don't like Red Robbin and then make the decision to go.We went last weekend and ehh! Service was slow,waited too long after being seated for a waitress to come over, in her defense she was working hard just not at my table,she had a giant party and probably shouldn't have had any more seated in her section. The kid liked his burger my soggy fish and chips not so much. I won't be going back until I forget why again.

Haven't had any problems here. In fact, the bar tender Terry is the one who introduced us to fireball and we haven't looked back since.  Their food is pretty good, I love their chili burger and my husband loves their damn good burger. Love the endless fries! I haven't had any staff issues they always seem friendly to me.

The staff was friendly but everything else was ok. Just a really underwhelming presentation and the place was a little dirty including where we were sitting. I got one of the ciabatta burgers and the bottom bun pretty much absorbed all of the burger grease. It was real soggy and gross.

Get it together Red Robin. Cold food in the middle of the day? Had lunch here the other day at noon and everyone's fries were cold. I guess they have unlimited fries so the portions we got were small, but cold. Then waitress asks if we wAnt more fries...yeah sure. She brings out hot fries and tells us they're fresh from the fryer. Shouldn't they all have been fresh and hot? Lame Typical chain restaurant, something's always off.

I love Red Robin, I always get the bruschetta chicken burger and it never disappoints. My sister got the Royal burger was delicious as well. Our server Lindsey was very attentive, drinks were always filled. We came in when it was really busy and we got seated within 10 minutes, ordered and food came out so quick. Everything was amazing, I would definitely recommend this place.

Whenever my boyfriend and I said thank you to our server whenever she came by to "tend" to us, she never said your welcome. We weren't asking her to caress my hair or give us hugs, but atleast say your welcome. The moment we sat down, it felt like the service was not genuine. I even caught her telling the busser and mocking my boyfriend when we had to pay using the ziosk self payment system that was on the table, she stood right at the edge of the table watching him to see what she was going to get as a tip. Who does that? I saw her telling the busser and mocking my boyfriend on what he was doing at the self payment system. To the blonde girl with her  hair tied up in a bun, and with a red bow in a hair, how you acted is why you should of got $0 as a tip instead of the pitty $2 you got for your service today 11/15/2016 @ around 2:25-2:30pm. Never coming back to this red robin again.

Our evening started out poorly at Red Robin.. waited 8 minutes for someone to come to the front to seat us in the Filthy near empty restaurant.  We should have walked out with all the trash & food on the floor.  Our server was nice (the positive of our experience)  our appetizers came out luke warm & there was barely any cheese or bacon on the fries.  Wanted a medium rare burger.. They don't do Medium Rare anymore (guess the cooks don't know how to cook them properly) No Teriaki on my Bonzai burger & we had to wait an additional 10 minutes for my daughter's lettuce & tomato she asked for on the side from her burger..  Really C'mon.  The quality of food here has gone way downhill & we have eaten here less & less.  The fast food places in town are cleaner.  With all the great new restaurants in town we probably wont be back at this one.!
Red Robbins is a very good burger joint. Prices are decent for a sit down place! Unlimited fries oh ya! Service with a smile is always nice.

We went here last night for an early Valentine's dinner. We had 8 people in our group. It only took them about 15 minutes to seat us which wasn't to bad since it was a holiday. Our waiter, David was awesome. He was on top of everything the entire night and the restaurant was packed. He made our dinner go smooth!! Thanks David we will be back

Service was okay and the food always tastes great. I never come here by my choice, usually when a group votes and I try and give a place a benefit of the doubt. But the last two times I've been here I got severely ill to my stomach and left feeling like crap the entire next day. Last night was the final straw.

I haven't been here in a while and I have to say I was very impressed. We were seated right away in the bar area. The server was excellent she brought our drinks right away and answered all our questions about the menu. I ordered the vegan Boca burger and my husband had the chicken sandwich. Both sandwiches came with bottomless fries. I ordered the sweet potatoe fries at an extra charge. I also added grilled mushrooms to my vegan burger, My husband's chicken sandwich was the bruschetta and he ordered regular fries.  We were both very satisfied with our meal. The food was served hot and promptly and was very tasty. We highly recommend this place.
As always the food and service is great! My food was cooked how I asked for it. There weren't any complaints.  Our server was fast and friendly.  She was on top of her game.

I really like this location and the update on their decorating scheme.  That being said, last time I went was not the best time.  We got sat right by the kitchen, which wasn't exactly a nice view and added a lot of noise to our meal.  There were other tables open which I would have much preferred.  Anyway, on a positive note, the food was really good as per usual and the server was very sweet.

Great patty melt!  It was cooked exactly as I ordered it. Great service! Leila was obviously very busy, but she smiled and took good care of everyone in her area! The support staff was friendly and helpful. The manager came around to see how things were going and asked how everything was tasting. If I have to find something wrong; it would be that the salt and pepper shakers should be wiped down as they clean the table for the next guest. Other than that everything was great with this visit!

My wife and I decided to give this place a try and did not have a decent dining experience. I have to admit, the service was pretty good but don't ever order the Fish and Fries. I'm not sure if it was old, over cooked or simply died of natural causes but it was absolutely the worst fish I have ever eaten. If you want fish, buy some fishsticks at the market and cook them yourself, they'll be way better.

My husband decided to check this place out after shopping at Target. We've lived in the area for 3 years and this is our first time trying Red Robin (says a lot, doesn't it?) But with two loud kids, we figured this is the place for them to do whatever they want and be loud without feeling guilty about it.  We arrived and got seated almost immediately. My daughter was impressed with the television in the floor by the waiting area.  We weren't that hungry, so we skipped the appetizer, but I got the raspberry lime soda while my husband got an arnold palmer (hey, that's my drink!)  We got my daughter the kids grilled cheese with a side of broccoli and she ate more of the broccoli than the burger (my girl loves her broccoli). I ordered the Royal Red Robin Burger which had an egg on it, it was really good, but messy. Boy are the big too! I could barely finish my burger! I also swapped out the fries for sweet potato fries instead. Which were also really good. They gave us two options for ketchup dipping to go with it.  My husband got the Whiskey River BBQ burger and he really enjoyed his as well, but like I said, the portions are big so we didn't finish our burgers and were too full to take advantage of the bottomless drinks. The fries are bottomless too, but we didn't get to take advantage of that.  On New Year Eve, it was still pretty full at 11:30 am, so I can imagine it being packed during any other day, so arrive here hungry with an empty stomach.

First time at a Red Robin, reminds me of a regular burger joint, nothing really special or stood out. I ordered the mini chopped wedge salad which was pretty tasty and the lettuce wrapped BBQ burger with side of black beans. The burger was delicious and cooked perfectly and the beans were mighty tasty too.  The strawberry lemonade was on the sweet side and I had the light version.  Overall good experience,  good customer service.
Horrible service waited an got to be seated for a burger... hostess kept saying we're next then called on 5 other party's  won't be back

It's alright. Overall Red Robin's food isn't that great and neither are the prices. I always try to give it a chance but after a handful of time I just think it's not worth it. Mediocre. There are better restaurants out there that I would chose over Red Robin

Every time we visit my grandmother, we come to this Red Robins and have a good time. The servers are very nice and friendly. They are also quick! My grandmother is picky, but she loves this place. The fries are fresh and hot. There was fresh white fish inside the fried fish and the portion was very generous. The burgers are good too.

Told the hostess it smelled like sewage when we walked in and she didnt seem to care and proceeded to try and sit us next to the bathrooms even though the place was mostly empty. Onion rings are the bomb here best i have ever had! Prime rib dip was just ok! A bit dry and mostly tiny shavings. Got their steak fries extra crispy cause the first batch was white.
Hamburgers are so tasty. I like how they have games to entertain my crazy kids. They give out balloons for the kids.

I can't express enough how wonderful our server Kevin was. We had a little wait before being seated and he immediately acknowledge it and apologized for the wait. He was enthusiastic our entire visit. My husband and I watched him with all his tables, and he didn't miss a beat. We go to Red Robin often and we have always get good service when we go there. Tonight we were very tired and had finished our front yard landscaping and we just wanted to hurry up and eat and go, Kevin made us feel like we could of stayed  and he gave us a burst of energy. He truly is an example of what guest service should be. Thank you Red Robin for hiring such a great guy.  Might I add this too, my husband left his phone on the table , we were just getting into our car when Kevin came running out with my husbands phone..
Worst service I've ever had at a red robin. They were not rude just slow. Slow to take order. Slow to have food come out. Just absolutely slow , and the best part is it was not busy

I will never come back here. Bad service and bad attitude. After wait by 15 mins, I still never even get addressed. No water, no silverware, not even a smile! There was only 1 table occupied.  Speaking with the manager on duty, Ramiro Maacas, he never handles the situation. If it was not for the manager Al, I would be completely done. This is my 4th time here with same problem. Same problem and I'm the same color every time there is a problem. I'm starting to think its racial.  Thank you Al for listening and trying to defuss the situation.

Bottomless fries? More like 6 fries per basket then the server plays hide and seek as you wait for another basket. The beef dip is a big ball of FAT and GRISSLE, it's almost as chewy as big league bubble gum. The cleanliness has declined and food has become under "average". For a place that advertises gormet burgers, they are nothing special. Totally never coming back!

Horrible experience  Red Robin is one of my favorite restaurants but this experience has solidified the fact that I won't ever be back to the Menifee location. I ordered the Bruschetta Chicken Sandwich. When it was delivered the chicken was gray and burnt (I don't know how the kitchen even let that leave) I sent it back and was given a new one which was great. The sever let me and my guest sit with dirty dishes on our table until I asked him to remove them. When the bill came I was charged twice for my sandwich (which I had to have corrected) and due to the paper being loaded incorrectly into the payment kiosk (I used a card) my receipt printed blank. The manager never came over and offered any apology. I will not be back.

Cool place to eat at. The food is awesome and we've had great service everytime we've gone. The people who are so critical of this place clearly have never worked in a restaurant and don't understand how hard a customer service job can be.

We have lived in Menifee for 10+ years, and of course prefer to stay local as often as possible.  Red Robin is always a quick go-to spot, but don't set your expectations too high in regards to the food.  The service has always been great, especially in the bar area.  Good, competent, professional servers.  The food unfortunately lacks in flavor, and quality.  Had the Tavern Mac & Cheese last night, and it was crazy dry.  Noodles, and a bit of cheese.  No creaminess at all.  And the french fries need to be fried a minute or two longer.  Very under cooked.  Our waitress was great and brought us a basket of fries that were well done.  Overall, its a good family place to eat, but keep in mind, it is not a 5* restaurant.

It is a Red Robin, what more is there to say.  Service o.k. usually, food o.k. always, but many times I want more than just o.k.  Burgers are good but not great.  Most of their menu is decent and we go there a few times a year - but when I want a great burger, or great fish and chips, or great anything else - I go elsewhere.

Red Robin used to be one of my favorite restaurants. I will not be returning there again.  The food used to be great, now it's just okay. Nothing really horrible but also nothing great either. Since the new management took over the service has been consistently bad. Long waits for food and service of any kind are commonplace here now. When you do get service it's subpar.  The last time I was there, four of the people in my party had to send their food back TWICE because the burgers were raw and cold in the middle. This time our food was cooked just fine but it took 28 minutes to come out then one of the orders was wrong. Nothing was special. The old garlic fries were amazing, these new ones are just fries with garlic and way too salty. No refills on those and they cost extra. Our refills on the regular fries came out at the end of our meal when everyone was almost finished. Anything gluten free also costs extra. Burgers tasted okay but nothing special.  The freckled lemonade is still amazing!   One adult and two children (no alcohol and one water as a drink, no appetizers or dessert) cost $44. Mediocre food, poor, very slow service and on the expensive side for what you get. (We had two regular cheeseburgers and a gluten free bacon cheeseburger plus beverages and fries)

Normally the service is awesome, but this time it was horrible. We waited 20-30 mins to be seated when we were told 10-15 min wait. Once we sat it took awhile for the waitress to come over and even take our drink order. We tried the new fried pickles. They were good but TOTALLY NOT worth $5!!! They gave us like maybe 10 little pickles!! RIP OFF! We got fries to tide us over from starvation before our meals came. Requested a refill on fries but apparently the waitress decided we didn't need them since she never brought more. When our meals finally came my daughters egg on her burger wasn't fully cooked even though we requested it to be and they put mayo on my sandwich which I asked not to be put on it. The waitress was apologetic and corrected both mistakes but I really think waitresses need to check there tickets to the orders before they just bring them to the tables. (We just had ice tea and soda so no reviews on the drinks.) My BLTA sandwich was great, I had no mayo or tomato and I added slices of cucumber on the side to put on the sandwich. It was really yummy!!! The waitress did give us our drinks to go and gave us a couple small boxes of fries to go but when we paid she neglected to ask us for our red robin card so our meals weren't add on - totally irritated me...... Overall the service wasn't up to par sadly. We came to red robin BECAUSE we normally received great service and great food, but this time it was thumbs down.
Great service will definitely come back. Alex our server was on top of everything and did s great job

Very disappointed in this place. It was our first time trying it. We got food to go and each had a drink while waiting. It was late at night and we got home after they closed. The whole meal was wrong. My burger had sauce all over it which I had asked to leave off. My husband ordered a salad and they gave him coleslaw but they remembered the dressing. The whole thing cost us $50 and I did not want my burger at all. Anyone who doesn't like sauces on things understands that a burger with something on it that you don't like is completely ruined.

Had the "crab cake" burger last night, as of this morning, 11 trips to the bathroom, still having stomach cramps, knew it didn't taste right. Will never go there again, lesson learned. Servers were rude also.

Had the best waiter by far! I have to give a shoutout to our waiter, Alex! I praise any waiters who can provide constant refills and is just on point with everything. She did all of this plus more! One example, Alex dropped off our onion rings and a second serving of strawberry lemonade. Our first glasses were still half way full and we were a tad confused, but she told us "you guys are having onions rings and will need it"...she was right! Haha! -Food is always prepared fast, hot and fresh! Haven't had any issues thus far. Their portions and bottomless fries will have you leaving full. -Strawberry lemonade is a MUST (at least for me) Other places use a strawberry syrup (meh!), but Red Robin has the good stuff with the strawberry bits. Makes a big difference! -Customer service was beyond what I expected! Seated quickly, food arrived in a timely manner, refilled constantly, and most of all our waiter knew what true customer service is all about! Thanks again to, Alex! Turned a great Saturday afternoon into a better one! Definitely spreading the word about the great service here!
my family and I came here for a birthday party ... the food was very good and our server Kevin was excellent ! he was very accommodating , very attentive and efficient! very good job !
3pm on a Saturday, place was busy, great burgers and fries,  tried a salad this time, not so good.  Service  was slow. Will probably give them another try

Thank you to Corporate and management , my dining experience was A+! Thank you for correcting the issue I had on my last visit! Great Customer Service! Way to make your guest feel important! I will definitely be returning. My burger was perfect! Thank you!

Great family restaurant. The menu has something for everyone and I've never been disappointed with any meal choice. The sweet potato fries are delicious! This visit, I tried their strawberry lemonade - pretty lame. It kind of tastes like a big glass of sugar. But don't worry, you won't be able to get much sugary liquid up the straw and into your mouth anyway, because the glass is full of ice and strawberry chunks. Its saving grace is that the refills are free, so if you have 2 or 3 you've at least gotten your money's worth.

It's all meh. The burger was actually pretty weak. The patty is much smaller than Chili's and I think their prices are very close. Onion rings were really good. They had Stone on tap and that was good since we had just came from the brewery. Server was good. I love burgers more than just about any food and for the money - the burger kills this place for me. It was so flavorless and smothered in lettuce to hide the weak little patty. I'll stick with Chili's for a chain sit-down burger. Won't be back.

The one time that I had been here before this, the food was decent, service wasn't memorable. Tonight I stopped in with a party of 6, they told us it would be a 35 minute wait, 50 minutes later they asked if they could split up our group into separate groups. This wouldn't have even been a big deal if the young hostess that was helping us hadn't had such a bad attitude. Her attitude was bad enough to make us call over to Bj's and eat there instead, considering they had no idea how much longer it would take to seat us together. Not sure that I would go back to this location at any point in the future.

The Menifee Red Robin has the best customer service out of any Red Robin I've been to. We were in a rush but they got my girl friend's  order incorrect. Since it was gonna take a while to redo, they comped both of our meals. Very unexpected! Good job Red Robin!

I've been eating at the Red Robin chain for years.  I've probably been to about 10 different RR's.  Over the last few years, this chain has steadily gone downhill for me.  This Red Robin has helped redeem the chain a little bit. There burgers are always really good and consistent no matter which RR you go to.  My personal fav. is the Royal RR with all its fried egg goodness.  The problem, for me over the last few years has been the defrosted appetizers and overall customer service.  I still have no doubt that the appetizers are still premade and defrosted to order, but at least this place does a good job of hiding that. Went here with the wife and we shared a half order of bbq wings and a small bowl of chili.  Both were delicious and I would order both of those each time I go back.  The service here was good, but not great.  It was better than other RR"s though.

I love the atmosphere don't know if we just ordered the wrong thing or what I tried the new crab burger and it tasted like oil I couldn't even taste crab my husband asked for a burger wrapped in lettuce with veggies on the side. While he was eating he said it didn't even taste like meat. Come to find out it was a veggie burger. I love garlic fries and these were not garlic fries it was fries with garlic salt on it? I was confused have they never eaten garlic fries before. If we go back I think we just need to order their regular items maybe those are better.

I was very excited that someone had given me a gift card to Red Robin. I had never been. First the server had a voice that matched nails on the chalkboard. After we were seated she came over twice, once for drinks and once for food. After a while another girl brought our food. She spilled the Au Jus all over my friends sandwich and it was soaked. Yes Yes I know you dip the sandwich in the juice anyway but the sandwich was floating like a dumpling in the juice. Never said sorry or do you want me to get you another plate. My hamburger was cold. I had about 8 fries in my little bucket that they say is bottomless.  We were never asked again if we needed anything. I know that there's a button on the table if I need to call the waitress but what happened to asking if everything is all right or do we need anything else with out being electronically called. We did have the pleasure of our waitress's big butt in our faces every time she leaned over to talk with the elderly group in the next table. We paid 40 dollars for this and then they wanted to tell us how much we should tip her. I tip because the food and server were good. If they guilt you into leaving the tip the restaurant and staff will not learn that a customer was not happy. I won't go again I get better service and food at Burger King.

Excellent selection of beer on tap, this is a gigantic Red Robin in a huge retail outlet. Their food was excellent and the service was incredible.  Our server's name was Robin which I thought was pretty cool. She brought out fries early and managed to keep our table happy despite us all beeing extremely hungry just off the road.

Stopped by this establishment on the way to San Diego. My dining partner was going to take a big test so she opted for a place she knew and felt comfortable with. We sat in the bar area to avoid a 30 minute wait for the dining room. While I saw at least 3 different bar area servers, we had a hard time getting any server's attention. After the mini-stack of onion rings, my silverware was removed and no servers came by for multiple minutes so I had to find my own replacement utensils. When entrees were brought out, mine had the wrong side item but server fixed it efficiently. Other RR's have allowed to me order the Santa Fe burger (topped with a green chili) that is no longer on the menu, but this location said it was not available.
Nice atmosphere, friendly staff, good food, and decent prices.  Oh, and did I mention the bottomless fries?!  :o)
Very good burgers, endless fries, good pricing, and a freebie on your birthday month. How can you argue with that. Sometimes packed other times not as bad, real hit and miss on that.

I think the menu choices here are really creative and the food is the right combination of textures, colors, and flavors. Between me and my boyfriend we spent $40 on the check, including tip. One drawback is it costs five dollars for a bottomless drink so this might not be in affordable place for everyone. I got the barbecue chicken wrap with the chicken tortilla soup. The soup was nothing special but the wrap was really good. My boyfriend got the bleu burger (with blue cheese). He was disappointed that it wasn't bigger for an $11 burger. He also got the endless rootbeer float. I tried it and was disappointed that they used soft-serve instead of ice cream, which makes for a different consistency. While my boyfriend agrees with me, he did still have three. haha!  They really could've used a couple more servers because the place was super busy. That being said, we were seated right away and the waitress checked on us within three minutes. All things considering, we received our food fast, though my boyfriend and complain that it took a while for the drinks. All in all, I would recommend trying this place at least once, if you have the cash to burn. If not, there is an in-and-out right across the way that you can hit instead.

It had been a while since I had been to red robin and I was very happy with our service. Our  waitress was so attentive and made sure we were happy and our drinks were full. She didn't talk to us a whole lot, but I didn't care cause I basically had my freckled lemonade in my mouth the whole time haha. Hands down one of the better experiences I've had there. It seemed as though all the servers were staying on top of their job and best of all, helping each other out.

AMAZING FOOD!!!! My brother in law was in town and we took him here for burgers and beer and we were so impressed by the quick service and how attentive our waitress was to our needs! The Manager Angelo even came over to chat with us and make sure our experience was exceptional and it was! Thank you for helping make my brothers experience a great one! I will recommend the Menifee Red Robin to all of my friends and family.

I honestly don't know what happened to this place. The food has deteriorated. The fries did not taste fresh, actually they seemed stiff like they have been sitting there and were reheated. My burger was soggy and just fell apart. It just seems that it got louder and with the remodeling it got ridiculously crowded and everyone is on top of everyone else. The waitress didn't write down our order so she came back asking what was ordered. And I just don't care for the little tablet offering games to play while you are eating. The whole point of going out to eat is to spend time with the people you go with and enjoy their company and talk to them, not play games while eating. I was just so disappointed. I will definitely not be returning to this place.

I have reviewed another Red Robin which is 3 star... this one did better! I was about to go to In and Out, but the wait would have been the same so I opted to come here. I was greeted promptly and placed a to go order. The Bleu Ribbon burger was good but the real reason for 4 star was that they had a local craft beer on tap Black Market Hefeweizen which was reasonable in price and "very" good with the lemon and orange. This location was busy yet still provided friendly service. I've been here before but Menifee Red Robin has improved since! Good Job.

Went in for an early lunch right as they had opened for the day. We were promptly greeted and given a table. Our waitress Sharon was great. Very attentive and offered some recommendations and let us know about changes they had made to our favorite side (garlic fries) which were still as delicious as before. Food was great and perfectly cooked. It was a bit cold at our particular booth as the a/c was blowing directly on us but I'd rather be too cold than uncomfortably warm. Will definitely return to this location.

I gave this restaurant two stars for the quality of the food only. Since the change in management customer service has always been consistently bad. As a former server I always analyze and assess the servers situation to understand the amazingly SLOW waits. Average is 10-15 minutes just to get drinks and always by the hostess...and more often than not the staff is so frazzled they forget half the items we request. It is blatantly apparent a skeleton crew is present....even when it's not very busy the servers are struggling...makes me wonder if management is straining their labor budget to bonus. After today's visit it's safe to say we won't be back. Every visit in 2015 has been terrible...to say the least.
What an experience, my hamburger  buns had mold on them. After that I was done did not want to be compensated just had to leave, won't be eating R R anymore.

Love Red Robin and love Robyn that works there! She's fast, friendly and keeps the fries coming :) I don't mind waiting to sit in her section because I know I will get in and out. Food is always good...and so is the service.
I should have read the reviews prior to our visit  Poor service, Crappy attitudes, cold food.  Not coming back to this location.

First off, the food is always amazing. The lower stars is for the service. We come every so often, but always have terrible customer service. We came last week for my fiance's birthday burger. Completely got our order's wrong. Today, the same thing. After telling our waitress it was wrong, she still set it down in front of us. When we flagged her down and told her it was wrong, she gave us attitude to take them back. We received no napkins, empty glasses left on our table the whole time, and just plain rude. Then our waitress rolled her eyes when we asked for more fries. Ridiculous. Great new renovations, time to get a new staff.

I'm normally super happy going to Red Robin but this time.. not so much. I was greeted by I'm assuming the manager on duty considering she was dressed differently from  everyone else. She wasn't so happy or pleasant to speak to since there was no "hello" or smile, just "how many and your name?". That didn't really bother me.  What bothered me the most was after a 15-20 min wait people that came after me were being seated. I mean I get it, it's a busy day and you have a lot of people but considering that my party was only 2 people I figured that it'll be easy; offer the bar or something. So after a party of 2 that came after me were asked if they were over 21 and they would be seated before me, I was pretty mad. I went up to the hostess booth and was told that they were getting a table but they had to seat a table of 6 which by the way came after me. After being called we were seated in the way back corner next to the bathrooms.  The server was very mediocre, nothing special. She did her job and was able to give me a glimpse of hope for my meal. I didn't want the experience with the "hostess" hinder my experience with the server (hence the 2 stars rather than 1 star).  Needless to say, my first interaction with the first person that works at this specific restaurant molded my impression of the whole business.  Hopefully someone from this restaurant reads this so that they can help their customer service.

I've been to this location twice now and won't go back. Extremely slow service! I have always loved Red Robin so that's the only reason for 3 stars. We sat right next to the line so I could see that my food was up and ready to send out, yet it took 10 minutes (I actually timed it) for it to hit our table. Then instantly our meals came out. Our server came by only once. The busser was the one who came by and asked if I wanted a refill in my iced tea. I don't know if they were understaffed or what, but it was terrible service. Once I looked around, I even noticed the manager and 3 employees just standing around talking while customers food was dying in the window. I'll still visit Red Robin, but only the mall location now. This one is just too disorganized.

On Sept 5th at 4:55 PM I placed a to go order by phone. Sarah said it would be 15 minutes. I arrived at 5:15, paid for the order at 5:27 and received it at 5:40. Upon arriving home, I realized the order was incorrect and also cold. What a waste of time and money. I don't recommend their take out food. Conveniently their web site does not work if you go the register a complaint, the "submit" button is dead, just like my future business with them.
We had great service in the bar area and got our food really fast. Sheryl was our server/bartender and was excellent and on top of things.

Came here for my birthday with my wife. For a Saturday night it was fairly busy but we were attended to quickly and sat fast. After ordering my burger with "bottomless fries" I received a plate with literally 5 fries in a basket. The manager Joe came by and asked how the food was and I made a joke about the 5 fries we received. He immediately went to the back and came out with 2 more baskets for my wife and I! Overall the food was great and I'm glad joe went above and beyond to attend to us. We will be coming back. Thanks Joe.

My husband and I have come by this Red Robin from time to time and have had mediocre to bad service sitting at or in the bar. This last time we were pleasantly surprised to see a new face behind the bar Sheryl, who was not only kind and hospitable.. But she was good at juggling her bar guests and her table guests. We at no point felt ignored or unattended to.. Which are two different things, I assure you. She was quick, responsive, anticipated our needs before we had them.. All these things we never experienced in the bar at this red robin before. Great job Sheryl and thank you.

I've gone here often & I do like it. But switched to other restaurants due to the excessive noise!   I've had gone for my birthday with family and really enjoyed it.   Love their burgers, but by comparison,  it is the noisiest restaurant around and unless someone else prefers this, I won't be back anytime soon.

Very bad attitude on the front. Girl was talking to her co worker for 15 mins. No hello to the customer or she did not ask us for the table, rather we end up telling her that we need table for 4 people and then she rolled her eyes on us.  Very bad experience.  Not going back there.

Excellent service! My friend and I sat at the bar and had great service from Jess. She did it all! She did shakes, drinks and to go orders. I was surprised at how much she had to do and was still a star! We will definitely be back!

Great food and Service at this location... Food was hot and tasty, and Service was excellent! Everything we asked for was brought in a timely manner and we never had to ask for a refill! Love their fries!

Went to Red Robin's on Saturday night & quickly got a booth at the bar. At first we put our names on the waiting list and were expecting to wait 20 minutes but because we looked at the (seat yourself) bar seating, we got served right away! Nice!  What was even MORE awesome was that not only was the service superb, the bar area was ages 21 and over and that rule was abided by! It's great to be able to be in an adult environment sometimes and not be near a bunch of loud children when you would rather enjoy some peace and quiet. I wish more restaurants offered this option.  There was a good selection of beers including Stone IPA and Blue Moon. The soft drinks were bottomless and so were the deliciously-seasoned French fries. The fries didn't taste frozen either which is a plus because most restaurant fries taste freezer-burned unless fresh.  Our food was prepared as we requested. I had a concern with something of mine and it was immediately replaced. I felt no guilt because they truly made me feel good about being a patron! They supplied my messy self many napkins and refilled our drinks.  Overall it was a great place! If I could press anything it would be that the front staff seemed a little scattered maybe because there wasn't exactly a podium (which made me feel awkward.) Also, I would like to add that whomever I guessed to be the manager -- did walk around but never actually interacted with guests. The assumed manager was very quiet and mostly just talked to the employees -- I think it would have been a better experience if the manager would have interacted with guests. You never know how their day is going so I'm not upset or anything it's just a note.  I'd go again and definitely sit in the bar area! In fact, I'd wait for the bar area just for the no kids rule.

Red Robin gourmet burgers and brews. How does a restaurant be out of beer on tap.  We went to eat at 4:50  to beat the dinner rush and they only had two servers on staff until 5:00. We had to wait 15 minutes to be seated. We asked to sit in the bar since it appeared to be better staffed but no kids allowed. Seems like really bad management. Our server was nice at least.  I went to RR for a beer and a burger only to be told they had no beer on tap. Then I was delivered the wrong bottle of beer. Finally, every time I eat at this restaurant I pay for a basket of fries only to get 5 fries in the basket.  When I ask for more since they are "endless" it takes so long to get them I do not want them anymore since dinner is over.  I will no longer eat at the Menifee location due to its awful management.
The staff has always been very friendly, never a long wait to get seated, food is always hot and quick, waitress has always been great.

All these stars go to the stand out host, Sarah.  As usual, the food, service, and atmosphere was above average at best buy worth the trip. I was VERY disappointed in the advertisement of burgers and brews to find the tap list was one of the weakest that I have encountered. Luckily I wasn't coming in looking for something unique or craft, I just wanted a burger. The highlight of our entire experience was Sarah. She was engaging, very sweet, and I would come back again for her! Rarely do I feel so strongly about how great a human being is that I need to tell the world, but I am currently sitting in the restaurant and created a yelp account just to let the world know this girl rocked. I hope she will be a server soon so more people can experience how wonderful she is.

Sat down after a 20 minute wait and after ordering drinks I asked our server if we could get some bottomless fries, she looked at me like I had two heads and rolled her eyes. She said " I  am not sure" and walked away. Needless to say we paid for our drinks and left, we decided to go over to Texas Roadhouse for dinner! Who wants to take their entire family out for a meal and get terrible customer service. This is the second time we have had bad service here. The last time my kids corndogs were still frozen in the middle. And our waitress made small talk with us about how gross she feels at the end of the day when she gets home from here, she is all greasy and sweaty. YUCK!! Thats the last thing you want to hear when you're eating!

Terrible service. Jennifer was supposed to be our server but ignored us the whole time and passed us onto 3 other servers. She never took our drink order and it took 10 minutes to be greeted by ANOTHER server and finally get our drinks. When we got our food, my burger was so over seasoned I couldn't eat it, and so dry it was falling apart, the bun was soggy with grease and tasted like something I would get from McDonald's. She  never came back to ask if our meal was ok even though the entire place was pretty much empty. Finally at the end of our meal Jennifer took our plates. We won't be coming back.

Love this place food family and fun customer service is excellent. The atmosphere is perfect for Friday nite family time not too kiddie but perfect for kids the drinks are nice and fair priced to make up for not having a happy hour. Bottomless fries are great to curb the wait time overall u can't go wrong with this place
I am in love with the blue cheese burger here! Happy hour is great many great drinks to choose from. Clean bathrooms a big plus  and friendly staff ;)

Great food. Staff is ok.  What we ordered: Fiesta salad Fried zucchini Garlic fries (amazing) If you want a place that always fills you up for a relatively low price, this is the place.  Happy eating!

My low rating is 70% based on horrible service and 30% on just average food.  This place clearly lacks in good management.  The waitress staff all walks around with a clueless look on their face.  A very disturbing site though was an employee fooling with MP3 player and taking off his jacket in the food prep area after just waking in the front door.  Again where is. The nanager???

Let me start by saying I used to hate Red Robin. Now, I have two kids and I'm all for this place. I've been to a few and this one seems on point with a lot of things. They are clean, quick and great with kids. Which is important when you have a toddler who wants to talk to everyone. Food is good and there is a full bar. This particular place is one of our favorite to go to. Honestly....they are quick, we are in and out fast. I really don't like that they put malt vinegar bottles at the table. My son totally broke one a couple years ago. It was terrible. I know as a parent I should keep that away from my kid but this is the only restaurant that we have gone to that has it at the table. And that particular time the bottle was hidden behind a menu.
Place is shit. This used to be good but not anymore. I rather drive to temecula to get better food and service.

We enjoy coming to this restaurant as a family.  They are very good to kids!  I usually have the Gourmet Cheeseburger, minus the pickle relish and onions and with bleu cheese.  I love how bleu cheese is a choice here.  The freckled lemonades are amazing. My husband usually has the Burnin' Love burger, which spicy and served with a jalapeno on top.  Our young adult son loves the free refills on root beer floats.
Of course the food is great but "company policy" to charge full price (essentially double) to share a root beer float is a bit too capitalistic.

Service was OK. We were seated promptly but the environment was terrible. Lots of noisy kids with parents that could care less about social etiquette. The food was OK   My salad greens were on the wilted tasteless side   They had run out of hard boiled eggs and would only substitute with cucumbers which is a totally opposite food group :(. The server forgot my garlic bread until I mentioned it but she was pleasant and apologized. My husband had a hamburger but he compared the quality to be equivalent to a fast food taco place at twice the cost.  We didn't leave hungry but we won't be going back

this is about FALSE advertising ( the food is great though )      tues free burger...the ad says......FREE Tavern burger with the purchase of ANY burger.    well....NOT true, so this is a lie.     it should have said free burger with ALMOST any burger purchase, see exclusions.  so when I saw this misleading ad, I was wow thats a great deal, i can get a free $7 burger when I buy one,  what a great promo seven bucks for two burgers fries , oh also I need to buy two sodas but thats still a great deal so it got me in there.     only to find out its FALSE....the manager tells me I have to buy a EXPENSIVE burger to get the other free...BUT thats just NOT what they're fake ad says in bold writing.    she pointed out to me the fine print that was  sooooo tiny , about the size of "your name on a grain of rice"   mean while the bold ad looked like a banner behind a plane at the beach !   shame on RED ROBIN for doing things like this. funny, I tried to write corp but thier site must be crashed with complaints about this because they are not accepting e/ms.

Used to be able to get a burger here that wasn't a hockey puck but not anymore. I guess the meat the use isn't as good as in n out because they will cook to order at in n out. New manager says it policy but it was ok before. Service was marginal very slow

I've never had an issue here. Hubs and I always go to the bar though so not sure how dining room is. Our server was super friendly and made sure everything was great but didn't bug us too much. I do kinda agree the prices are a little high but the food is pretty good so I guess that's okay. Could be a little lower. Love their alcoholic drinks and they have a nice variety. Parking can be a pain when it's the weekend or even during the week at lunch time. My suggestion is park on the other side and you should be fine. Can I just say how much I love that the bar is only 21+ now? So awesome. Thanks Red Robin.

My wife and I ate there this past Sunday. Our drinks and onion rings got served pretty quick. Our burgers took a good 20 minutes, and after we finished our waitress brought the check without asking if we wanted more fries or dessert. It was busy but that's no excuse for poor customer service. This is the only time I've had a problem at this location, so I'll give them another chance before I write them off.

Truly a disappointment! We had a party of 5 tonight, we got there at 6:00 and it wasn't very busy, however it seemed as if they had a full house the way we were treated. It took about 10 minutes to even get greeted at our table, so when our server finally came we were all ready to order. It is now about 6:20. At 7:00, she came to tell us that the kitchen is really behind and it will be a little while before our food is out.   A little while to me is 10-15 min, but we waited over 1 hour for our food.  That is terrible.  When we finally got our food it was just average, nothing special. I got the BBQ chicken wrap and for $10, I could of made it better at home.  Our server dropped off our bill, we gave it back immediately and we waited almost 15min to get it back. We watched her take out food, go to table to table and then finally when she saw our faces, she brought back our card. I think she completely forgot about us.  We definitely will not be back. Service was terrible and the food is over priced.

I'm sorry but they have the worst service ever.  I'm finally writing a review after several visits when it was packed and when it was dead.  They take forever to bring your appetizers after you ordered.   It's not cool when your appetizer and your food get there at the same time.  I'll just drive to the temecula Red Robin.

We LOVE to eat here! Food is Always good & my hubby says they have Always got the BEST & COLDEST beer on tap! This family is happy! Also, we ALWAYS LOVE being Welcomed in to dinner by the Hostess Alyssa Olhausen, she is super friendly & we love to chat with her after she seats us!

I'm sad not to be able to give Red Robin a better rating since this is probably one of my most favorite restaurants.  The last 2 times my husband and I have been there service has not been the best and the food wasn't the best either.  Why would you offer bottomless fries and when someone asks for more fries you take forever and then when you do bring them they are cold? I just don't understand.  My last visit I ordered a salad and that was definitely a joke, small salad with a few diced tomatoes and cucumbers and topped with lots of cheese and the lettuce was old. Not the best anymore :(

Red Robin always has great food and service. It was a little crazy tonight but not enough for me to trash an old favorite. My aunts chicken salad came out hot because it was left under the heater waiting for all of our meals to be done and the manger gladly gave her a new plate. It was nice. Like I said, can't complain too much.  If you want to try something different try the Royal Robin. It has a fried egg. Soooo good.
The food is good but when you ask for their bottomless fries I guess bottomless means  8 fries.
Great food. The burgers are my favorite food on the menu. The customer service is usually great! The location is always clean and the atmosphere is awesome for being in Menifee.
I ate here the other day and the hostess Alyssa was really helpful. I believe she can use her skills to make the restaurant better as a server.

Came to eat with a group of 10. On a Sunday. They had limited service and only two servers. Took the host over 20 mins to seat us when they said 10-15 mins. Then another 12 mins to take our order. This service was not what I expected. When you get rude hostess and even female manager! However our server was fast and friendly gotta give him a 4 stars!

To be honest I was not impressed. We had onion rings good no salt easy to use. The fries good, everything needed salt. My wife had the same. Split one order rings and fish and chips. Malted viniger was like water no flavor. No salt. Rings were best of whole dish. I am not sure it I will ever return. We spent plus 30USD for single ho hum lunch we shared. It is not worth mediocrity.

Went again... Free birthday burger called us in and I couldn't help myself. But, sadly, it doomed our former love for Red Robin. Our server was actually attentive but the food was lackluster. Fries that were almost cold, sloppily put together burgers. And though I previously posted that we thought the Temecula location was fine we gave them another try and much to our disappointment found the same lackluster flavors. So sad, we will miss you Red Robin.

This review will sum up my last five visits to this store. To better understand, each star out of the five allowed is on a great visit. 2/5 visits to this location have been great! Food was hot and tasted awesome and service was fantastic. The other three were all relatively the same in comparison with each other. All times food was very slow to come out and all three times something was cold and incorrect in my party's order. All three times service was very poor (no check backs, you have to flag another server for refills and don't even bother trying to ask for condiments or more fries). I definantly would suggest another red robin location like Hemet and Temecula over this one. Which is a bummer because this ones local.
I always have good service, good food BUT I like GOOD mustard with a good hamburger, like Greg Poupon!  Yikes, not Frenches, please.  Whiskey River is the bomb.
I am a fan of their burgers and would reccomend you try one. I have yet to try anything else but  I have a feeling it wouldn't be anything amazing. Just your generic all american restaurant.

New location which means clean and over zealous staff.  I appreciated the attention our waiter gave us and should have remembered his name to give a proper shout out.  If t wasn't for his friendliness and charismatic personality my experience would have been less because I regard service as an important part of my dining experience.  I will try it again, just not right away.

A few months my husband and I came here with some friends for lunch. It took 30 min for someone to take our drink order then another 45 min to bring us our food. The manger comped our check witch was nice considering what happened. Today we decide to try again because we like the food and went back to this red robin location, once again experience long wait times. Not sure we will be coming back to this location again.

Came here with my sister, her fiance, her fiance's mom, and her fiance's friend. Came here for lunch on Veteran's day. They had a special going on where if you were a veteran or whatever you get a free appetizer IF you had a printed version of the coupon which my sister did not print out. I got the Bleu Ribbon Burger. I didnt like it. I didn't like the sauce they put on it. I should have chosen something else. The Endless steak fries is good though. and they have their own seasoning salt that you can sprinkle on your fries. The service was good. It was fast and friendly. The waitress remembered what everyone ordered and always came back asking if we wanted refills.
Alex B did a great job. She was very attentive and always checked in with us to make sure we were doing good. Thank you Alex B for your hard work :) The food was delicious too!!

When this particular Red Robin opened a couple years ago it was beyond spectacular.  I love the restaurant as a whole.  Unfortunately, this one, the one in Menifee, CA has degraded to a cheap jobs program that seems to employ only the lowest people that really don't care if they do their job or not. Tonight, my wife and I went in at about 7:45.  The restaurant was only half full, so not particularly busy by any standard.  We were promptly seated and . . . and . . . and . . . well suffice to say that is where the wheels came off.  A waitress finally came by after about ten minutes and said she would be right with us.  After another 10 minutes or so, she came by again, and repeated, "I will be right with you."  A few minutes later, we were told again she would be right with us.  On her fourth visit and proclamation she'd be right with us, we got up and left. Red Robin as a chain is generally a wonderful restaurant.  However, save yourself the time plus a good deal of frustration and avoid the Red Robin in Menifee, CA.

We drove to red robin because we were craving their burgers! Of course the center that this red robin is located in is awesome in general. And location wise red robin is awesome. From the moment we walked in we were greeted nicely and sat right away. Selina (I think) wound up being our waitress and she was great! We were attended to cared about and compared to service we seem to get at every other restaurant, Red Robin left us smiling after we left. Thank you so much. We will definitely be back.
Found large metal piece of something in my salad. Manager didn't know what it was but comped our food. Service was blah. Portion sizes were much smaller than a year ago.

Was there yesterday for a quick surprise lunch with my lady. A burger is always good, but since i watch my intake, had the blt . Very good. Sat in self seating and we were taken care of very well. Thanks

I know that you can't expect much from red robin, but being in the industry I was beyond disappointed! We sat down at a bartop with no body sitting at it bartender had maybe three tickets and three tables and was completely over whelmed. If took at least 8 mins before we got menus or our drink order taken. Appetizer took at least 15 mins and our entries around 25 mins. Red robins timing standards are 8 mins huge fail. My appetizer cheese was cold my bun on my burger was hard as a rock and it was all frustrating. Bartender and some other serve sat there and had a whole conversation right in front of my fiancée and I. Literally so loud that we couldn't even carry a conversation. I'm not one to complain but this was a really bad experience. Temecula location way better.
Banzai Burger is the Best Burger ever. I just love it! But the restaurant has No WiFi. Smh! Bummer...

Horrible! I went at  lunch time you would think this place would have ample amount of staff to get their customers seated right? Nope not here. The wait was about 30-45 min if it was up to me I would have left but my sister wanted to wait it out okay that's fine. I'm not sure why the lady asked everyone if the people in their party were all 21 or over but yet not one person was getting seated in the bar area lol didn't make any sense to me. This place needs to get it together. I'm so happy manifest have some sit down restaurants but all of them seem to have bad service which really sucks. I'll make the drive to temecula next time I want to eat at a red robin.

I am not a red meat eater! No problem here as the Arctic Cod & Chips was excellent! My guest's ordered burgers and were very satisfied. We found the service to be overwhelmingly good, with very attentive staff.......Overall, a good place to eat in Menifee.

Once again we had an amazing experience at Red Robin! It's like night and day from the first review I submitted. Our waitress, Sarah, was attentive, fun, and sweet. The staff as a whole seemed happy, energetic, and ready to work. Wow! I must give props to whomever implemented the changes. It's made a HUGE difference! We'll definitely be back :) ps the food, as always, was delicious, too!

My husband and I came here for his free birthday burger.  We were both quite happy with our service.  I've read the reviews that say this place is hit-and-miss with the service.  (But then again, aren't all casual dining chains this way?)  So we were lucky to be here on a "hit" day!  I got a burger without a bun because I wasn't craving bread that particular day.  (NOTE: burgers suck without buns, even if I don't want bread I'll get it on a bun because now I know I'll regret it later.)  I can't remember what burger my husband had but it was free so of course he was a happy camper.  I believe it was the Prime Chophouse though I could be wrong.  It was certainly delicious.   This Red Robin has the same ups and downs as any other major casual ding chain, but overall we had a good experience here and we really did get a great server.  One thing I like about Red Robin in general is I can get burgers and beer and be segregated from the families with kids while I eat, which makes me more likely to visit a Red Robin than other places in its class.  We'd likely come here again if we need to visit Menifee again but we truly don't come out this way often.   As yelp says, A-OK.

I had the Whisky Burger yesterday at lunch It was TEPID (we waited almost 1/2 hour for the food) It was greasy and soggy especially the "crisp" onion strips The manager took it off the ticket When I got home I felt strange I lied down and went to sleep I woke up in cold sweats in about 2 hours, with headache  aching body all over and incredible shivers like spasms I obviously had fever  I started to vomit several times and it definitely was  the hamburger coming out I had diarrea and a horrible night with shivers burps and gas This is an obvious case of food poisoning: E-coli???? TOO BAD I USED TO LIKE THAT RESTAURANT BUT NEVER AGAIN

Worst service ever. Jennifer was our server, she ignored us through the entire meal and didn't even look at us. It took 15 minutes for us to be greeted/take our drink order despite the fact that a majority of the tables were empty. We were passed on to three different servers throughout the meal. When I finally got my food it was hugely over seasoned and very dry. My mother's food was bland and had absolutely no flavor. We will not be returning.
Service was great! Food that was recommended was delicious.  Wait  to be srated was only 10 min. Waitress was amazing! She kept cleaning up the table and checked on us time to time

I was in there last Saturday at around 6:30 or 7:00. The food was delicious and my waitress was doing the best she could. However, she was lagging. Thank God Christine, the hostess, picked up the slack of my not so with-it waitress. The restaurant was super busy so no one was sitting around but my table still could have missed some attentive service if it wasn't for her. I was super impressed with how sweet, helpful and attentive she was. What a team player!

This place is horrible. The service is not even close to acceptable.  We asked for extra fries for the baby and didnt get them until after our food came and we had to ask again before he remembered.  Our drinks were empty before we got our food, the waiter brought the food took 5 minutes to come with the drinks, when we asked for our check and stated we were in a hurry because the baby was getting cranky he didn't return for another 5 minutes. The food was okay but I've had better burgers. The service is just plain awful. Will not go back.

Woooow! Unreal how bad this place is. First off..the bartender had no clue what she was doing and admitted she was a server not a bartender. My guacamole bacon burger had no guacamole on it. I pointed this out to the bartender/server and she said "it's in the spread" which was a few pieces of lettuce on my soggy bun. She then poured 2 irish carbaums from an already opened bottle of Guinness!!!! Had to remind them about sauces that we had asked for before services and food was cold from being forgotten about under the heat lamp. Please close your doors. You suck so bad.

Mostly good food. never had any real problems here. One of the best parts of this place is that they don't allowed children in the bar. Thats a huge thing for me and my family. We like to sit in the bar to get away from screaming children fighting with their parent. Enjoy people.
